subject: Smalltalk was: Re: how to use ExceptionTestCase ?
msgSnippet: ... It seems to me making a comeback.  Dynamic languages in generally look to be getting more popular.. and of course, Smalltalk is the grandaddy of all
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Ilja Preuss" <preuss@d...> wrote:
> > except that it's nicer in Smalltalk.
>
> Yes! If only someone would pay me for programming in Smalltalk... :( ;)

It seems to me making a comeback. Dynamic languages in generally look
to be getting more popular.. and of course, Smalltalk is the grandaddy
of all dymnamic languages (both in terms of ancestry and sheer power).

Dave
